titleStmt.title: The Pleasant and delightful history of Captain Hind wherein is set forth a more full and perfect relation of his several exploits ...

notesStmt.note: Pages faded and stained with some loss of print.
Caption reads "The most pleasant and delightful history of Captain James Hind; and a full relation of all his strange exploits and robberies."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
